title: Game Crashes after Champ Select... Please HELP
body: So after the new update I can no longer get into any game. Tried doing a blind pick and several customs just to try and solve it. Used the bugsplat support page and did all the recommendations and still to no avail. Bugsplat just pops up instead of me being able to enter a game. Even reinstalled my drivers completely. Literally just started happening for this patch. :( PLEASE HELP

Bugsplats are usually caused by hardware, driver, or game file problems failing to render the game.  I'm not sure which article you looked at, but just in case I suggest going over every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out these possibilities and get your game back in shape.  That should help, but let me know if you have any questions.
